name: Charlie the Chameleon
description:
Charlie the Chameleon is a action / arcade game made with libGDX (android) at the 2019 UCF Computer Science Summer Institute.

Help Charlie dodge the poisonous berries by either moving out of their way, or changing your color to that of the berry to "blend in" and avoid it.

Make sure to check out the cutscene by touching / clicking the chameleon on the left side of the main menu!

Enjoy our final project,

Blake Gassman and Lucas Marrou
